ਕੌਣ ਚੰਗੀ ਚੀਜ਼ ਲੈ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking a good thing?
Who had been taking the first thing?
Pahilī cīza kauṇa lai rihā sī?
ਪਹਿਲੀ ਚੀਜ਼ ਕੌਣ ਲੈ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking the first thing?
Who had been taking a many things?
Kauṇa bahuta sārī'āṁ cīzāṁ lai rihā sī?
ਕੌਣ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਚੀਜ਼ਾਂ ਲੈ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking a many things?
Who had been taking each thing?
Kauṇa hara cīza lai rihā sī?
ਕੌਣ ਹਰ ਚੀਜ਼ ਲੈ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking each thing?
Who had been taking good time?
Kauṇa cagā samāṁ ka? Rihā sī?
ਕੌਣ ਚੰਗਾ ਸਮਾਂ ਕੱ? ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking good time?
Who had been taking the first time?
Kauṇa pahilī vāra lai rihā sī?
ਕੌਣ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਵਾਰ ਲੈ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking the first time?
Who had been taking many times?
Kauṇa bahuta vāra lai gi'ā sī?
ਕੌਣ ਬਹੁਤ ਵਾਰ ਲੈ ਗਿਆ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking many times?
Who had been taking each time?
Hara vāra kauṇa jāndā rihā sī?
ਹਰ ਵਾਰ ਕੌਣ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਸੀ?
Who had been taking each time?
